BackstoryDef.title: Droid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Droids, less commonly known as robots or automatons, are mechanical beings that possess artificial intellgience. They are used in a variety of roles and environments, often those considered too medial or dangerous for organic species, but also in fields that require extensive specialization and knowledge.

BackstoryDef.title: Old Droid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Droids are often around for longer than their creators, some have been operational for hundreds, if not thousands of years.
